com.ooyala.android.item

Class Video

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.item.ContentItem
      • com.ooyala.android.item.Video
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizableItem, PlayableItem, com.ooyala.android.OrderedMapValue<String>

    public class Video
extends ContentItem
implements PlayableItem
    Stores the info and metatdata for the specified movie.
